snippet.title: INDIANA JONES and the Relic of the Viking | Mini-adventure re-release 1.1 | Walkthrough
snippet.description:
Indiana Jones and the Relic of the Viking is a free mini fan-made adventure game made by the Seven Cities of Gold Dev team. It was recently re-released for the Holidays. If you are a fan of the classic Lucasarts games and Indiana Jones and the Fate of Atlantis, then You owe it to yoursellf to play this fun little nostalgic game. They did a great job in capturing the mood and style of the original adventures. In the meantime they are working on a full fan adventure called Raiders of the Seven Cities of Gold. Looking forward to that as well!  


Enjoy!


You can download this mini-game for free (for now) at:
https://raidersofthesevencities.com/



If you like my videos and want to see more or if you want to get an update when I upload my next video, please consider subscribing! Thanks! It really helps and motivates me to keep doing these videos.Have any suggetions for a game you want me to play? Leave a comment! 

 #shadypartofme

Follow me on twitter!
https://twitter.com/Bartattack1
